ThingDef.label: megafauna bear incubator
ThingDef.description: This incubator has to be kept at a temperature between 0 and 50 degrees Celsius until the genetically modified organism is ready to hatch. The embryo will develop into a bear-Elasmotherium hybrid

ThingDef.label: megafauna boomalope incubator
ThingDef.description: This incubator has to be kept at a temperature between 0 and 50 degrees Celsius until the genetically modified organism is ready to hatch. The embryo will develop into a boomalope-Deinotherium hybrid
